title: Group portrait, including seated from left: Marie Russell, Doris Corsey, Helen Davis, Beatrice Redd, Barbara Simpson, Hatie Everett, Miriam Lewis, Odell Richardson; standing: Benjamin Foulk, Clarence Hutchinson, Alfreda Harper, Mildred Jane McKenzie, Betty Laverne White, Ruth Grant, Gladys Perry, Robert Kelley, Louis Cooper, John Brown, Ederick Todman, James Pruit, Lindsay S.
